ygData.subject: ROO Hunt
ygData.msgSnippet: Candidates	- All lvl 30 & above kakis who wish to have a ROO (Only 1 team, priority will be given to casters w/o ROO and Fesse) Venue		- OOT, Oracle Island
ygData.messageBody:
Candidates - All lvl 30 & above kakis who wish to have a ROO
(Only 1 team, priority will be given to casters w/o ROO and Fesse)
Venue - OOT, Oracle Island
Date - Coming soon

The oracle has a sure 100% drop for ROO, a dream robe for casters. She is
lvl 35. The main problem is the lvl 40 paladin that guard her (overpowered
I presume).

Plan is to let Fesse cast Atone on paladin, so that he will not attack,
while the rest nuke the hell out of the oracle and loot it. I will then
gate the whole party out. Not sure how fast the oracle will spawn. But we
can always go for it again.

Ziltus
